root.name: BCFX: The Doug Williams Edition
root.description: BCFX is a college football video that is heavily based around black college football and will feature only African-American players. Also, this game will be using Unreal Engine 3. BCFX also includes a drumline minigame that is compatible with the Rock Band drumset.Teams in BCFX Alcorn State UniversityAlabama A M University Alabama State University Albany State University University of Arkansas-Pine BluffBethune-Cookman University Benedict College Elizabeth City State UniversityFayetteville State UniversityFlorida A M UniversityFort Valley State UniversityGrambling State UniversityHampton UniversityJackson State UniversityJohnson C. Smith UniversityKentucky State UniversityLane UniversityLincoln University (Pennsylvania)Livingstone CollegeMiles CollegeMississippi Valley State UniversityMorehouse CollegePrairie View AM UniversitySt. Augustine's UniversitySt. Paul's College, VirginiaShaw UniversityLangston University
